Class BattleGrid

java.lang.Object
  java.awt.Component
      java.awt.Container
          javax.swing.JComponent
              javax.swing.JPanel
                  BattleGrid
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible
public class BattleGrid
extends javax.swing.JPanel

A BattleGrid is a grid on which two Players fight. It holds Monsters and Obstacles.

Author:
Ayush Mehra, Vincent Yang
See Also:
Serialized Form
